page.title: 14"A SCHOOLCHILD'S DAY".
page.content: My name is{Maria Gouldsborough.}I am {12 years old.}I live in{Smallfield}and I go to{Burstow County First and {Middle School}and I go to my{Secondary {School}in{September. Every morning I turn my radio on, then I start getting changed into my {school uniform,}brush my hair and go downstairs. At{school}I go into the{playground and wait for my friends.When they arrive we talk to each other until {9 a.m.}Then the whistle is blown and we all go into the{classroom}and sit down.The{register}is normally finished and it is taken down to the office. At{10.30 a.m.}we all go out to the playground and at{11 a.m.}we go back into the{classroom},pick up a hymn book and line up for{Assembly. Then we carry on with what we were
